cellularAutomata.neuron
Class Neuron

java.lang.Object
  cellularAutomata.neuron.Neuron

public class Neuron
extends java.lang.Object

The fundamental unit of a neural net. The neuron has a set of inputs, with each input assigned a weight. The sum of the weighted inputs is added to a threshold value and passed to a transfer function. The transfer function determines what values are output by the neuron. The default transfer function is a sigmoid given by 1.0/(1.0+exp(-transferSlope*summation)). Alternate transfer functions may be specified in a constructor.

Author:
David Bahr

Field Detail

DEFAULT_TRANSFER_FUNCTION

public static NeuronTransferFunction DEFAULT_TRANSFER_FUNCTION
The default transfer function for the neuron if no other is specified.

Constructor Detail

Neuron

public Neuron(double[] weights)
NeuralNet with a default sigmoid transfer function (having slope 1.0 at the origin) and a default threshold of 0.0. The number of inputs is determined by the number of weights.

Parameters:
weights - The array of weights used with inputs to the neuron.

Neuron

public Neuron(double[] weights,
              double threshold)
NeuralNet with a default sigmoid transfer function. The number of inputs is determined by the number of weights.

Parameters:
weights - The array of weights used with inputs to the neuron.
threshold - The bias assigned to the neuron's summation function. In other words, if the (weighted) sum of the inputs is zero, then the neuron passes the threshold value to the transfer function.

Neuron

public Neuron(double[] weights,
              double threshold,
              NeuronTransferFunction theTransferFunction)
The neuron has N inputs where N is the size of the array of weights. Each input has an associated weight and a threshold value.

Parameters:
weights - The array of weights assigned to the inputs of the neuron.
threshold - The bias assigned to the neuron's summation function. In other words, if the (weighted) sum of the inputs is zero, then the neuron passes the threshold value to the transfer function.
theTransferFunction - The function that converts the weighted sum of the inputs into the neuron's output.
Method Detail

calculateOutput

public double calculateOutput(double[] input)
                       throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
Calculates the output for any array of inputs. Sums the inputs (along with the threshold) and then applies the transfer function.

Parameters:
input - An array of neural inputs.
Returns:
The output value of the neuron.

java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
